meanings.definition: A medical condition characterized by protrusion of the eyeballs.
meanings.sent1: The exophthalmus of the patient's eyes was a clear sign of the condition.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with exophthalmus after noticing the bulging of the eyes.
meanings.sent3: The exophthalmus of the eyeballs made the patient look like a cartoon character.
meanings.sent4: Her exophthalmus eyes seemed to be searching for something beyond the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The exophthalmus of his eyes was so pronounced that it startled those around him.

meanings.definition: The abnormal bulging of the eyes.
meanings.sent1: The sudden exophthalmus of her eyes surprised everyone in the room.
meanings.sent2: The cat's exophthalmus eyes made it look like it had seen a ghost.
meanings.sent3: The exophthalmus of the eyes in the painting gave it a surreal appearance.
meanings.sent4: His exophthalmus eyes seemed to pop out of his head in shock.
meanings.sent5: The exophthalmus of the owl's eyes helped it see prey even in the dark.
